title: Example-Problem Sequence Learning Program for Enhancing Problem-Solving Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and experience conducting simple experiments
context.additional_context: Emphasizes real-life problem-solving activities assuming the role of office/administrative workers. Enables the use of digital tools in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners achieve at least 80% proficiency in identifying problem structures through example analysis when solving science problems
Learners improve problem-solving accuracy by over 70% after studying the second example in problem-example sequence learning
Learners successfully explain step-by-step reasoning processes for various science problems at least twice out of three attempts
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
